title: NPM Error Code 1 when using truffle unbox react
body:
- [ true] I've asked for help in the [Truffle Gitter](http://gitter.im/Consensys/truffle) before filing this issue.

---------------------------

## Issue
I have truffle installed globally, and in a clean directory, I run 'truffle unbox react'. This gives me a long list of errors.

## Steps to Reproduce
(assuming truffle installed globally)
mkdir token
cd token
truffle unbox react

## Expected Behavior
Expected to install truffle and react cleanly.

## Actual Results
A long list of errors is given, shown below:

Starting unbox...
=================

✔ Preparing to download box
✔ Downloading
npm ERR! code 1
npm ERR! path /home/victor/crypto/test/client/node_modules/sha3
npm ERR! command failed
npm ERR! command sh -c node-gyp rebuild
npm ERR! make: Entering directory '/home/victor/crypto/test/client/node_modules/sha3/build'
npm ERR!   CXX(target) Release/obj.target/sha3/src/addon.o
npm ERR! make: Leaving directory '/home/victor/crypto/test/client/node_modules/sha3/build'
npm ERR! gyp info it worked if it ends with ok
npm ERR! gyp info using node-gyp@7.1.2
npm ERR! gyp info using node@14.15.3 | linux | x64
npm ERR! gyp info find Python using Python version 3.8.5 found at "/home/victor/anaconda3/bin/python3"
npm ERR! gyp info spawn /home/victor/anaconda3/bin/python3
npm ERR! gyp info spawn args [
npm ERR! gyp info spawn args   '/home/victor/.nvm/versions/node/v14.15.3/lib/node_modules/npm/node_modules/node-gyp/gyp/gyp_main.py',
npm ERR! gyp info spawn args   'binding.gyp',
npm ERR! gyp info spawn args   '-f',
npm ERR! gyp info spawn args   'make',
npm ERR! gyp info spawn args   '-I',
npm ERR! gyp info spawn args   '/home/victor/crypto/test/client/node_modules/sha3/build/config.gypi',
npm ERR! gyp info spawn args   '-I',
npm ERR! gyp info spawn args   '/home/victor/.nvm/versions/node/v14.15.3/lib/node_modules/npm/node_modules/node-gyp/addon.gypi',
npm ERR! gyp info spawn args   '-I',
npm ERR! gyp info spawn args   '/home/victor/.cache/node-gyp/14.15.3/include/node/common.gypi',
npm ERR! gyp info spawn args   '-Dlibrary=shared_library',
npm ERR! gyp info spawn args   '-Dvisibility=default',
npm ERR! gyp info spawn args   '-Dnode_root_dir=/home/victor/.cache/node-gyp/14.15.3',
npm ERR! gyp info spawn args   '-Dnode_gyp_dir=/home/victor/.nvm/versions/node/v14.15.3/lib/node_modules/npm/node_modules/node-gyp',
npm ERR! gyp info spawn args   '-Dnode_lib_file=/home/victor/.cache/node-gyp/14.15.3/<(target_arch)/node.lib',
npm ERR! gyp info spawn args   '-Dmodule_root_dir=/home/victor/crypto/test/client/node_modules/sha3',
npm ERR! gyp info spawn args   '-Dnode_engine=v8',
npm ERR! gyp info spawn args   '--depth=.',
npm ERR! gyp info spawn args   '--no-parallel',
npm ERR! gyp info spawn args   '--generator-output',
npm ERR! gyp info spawn args   'build',
npm ERR! gyp info spawn args   '-Goutput_dir=.'
npm ERR! gyp info spawn args ]
npm ERR! gyp info spawn make
npm ERR! gyp info spawn args [ 'BUILDTYPE=Release', '-C', 'build' ]
npm ERR! In file included from ../src/addon.cpp:4:
npm ERR! ../node_modules/nan/nan.h: In function ‘void Nan::AsyncQueueWorker(Nan::AsyncWorker*)’:
npm ERR! ../node_modules/nan/nan.h:2232:62: warning: cast between incompatible function types from ‘void (*)(uv_work_t*)’ {aka ‘void (*)(uv_work_s*)’} to ‘uv_after_work_cb’ {aka ‘void (*)(uv_work_s*, int)’} [-Wcast-function-type]
npm ERR!  2232 |     , reinterpret_cast<uv_after_work_cb>(AsyncExecuteComplete)
npm ERR!       |                                                              ^
npm ERR! ../src/addon.cpp: In static member function ‘static Nan::NAN_METHOD_RETURN_TYPE SHA3Hash::New(Nan::NAN_METHOD_ARGS_TYPE)’:
npm ERR! ../src/addon.cpp:49:23: warning: ‘new’ of type ‘SHA3Hash’ with extended alignment 32 [-Waligned-new=]
npm ERR!    49 |    obj = new SHA3Hash();
npm ERR!       |                       ^
npm ERR! ../src/addon.cpp:49:23: note: uses ‘void* operator new(std::size_t)’, which does not have an alignment parameter
npm ERR! ../src/addon.cpp:49:23: note: use ‘-faligned-new’ to enable C++17 over-aligned new support
npm ERR! ../src/addon.cpp: In static member function ‘static void SHA3Hash::Init(Nan::ADDON_REGISTER_FUNCTION_ARGS_TYPE)’:
npm ERR! ../src/addon.cpp:83:27: error: no matching function for call to ‘v8::Object::Set(v8::Local<v8::String>&, v8::Local<v8::Function>&)’
npm ERR!    83 |   target->Set(className, f);
npm ERR!       |                           ^
npm ERR! In file included from /home/victor/.cache/node-gyp/14.15.3/include/node/node.h:67,
npm ERR!                  from ../src/addon.cpp:1:
npm ERR! /home/victor/.cache/node-gyp/14.15.3/include/node/v8.h:3670:37: note: candidate: ‘v8::Maybe<bool> v8::Object::Set(v8::Local<v8::Context>, v8::Local<v8::Value>, v8::Local<v8::Value>)’
npm ERR!  3670 |   V8_WARN_UNUSED_RESULT Maybe<bool> Set(Local<Context> context,
npm ERR!       |                                     ^~~
npm ERR! /home/victor/.cache/node-gyp/14.15.3/include/node/v8.h:3670:37: note:   candidate expects 3 arguments, 2 provided
npm ERR! /home/victor/.cache/node-gyp/14.15.3/include/node/v8.h:3673:37: note: candidate: ‘v8::Maybe<bool> v8::Object::Set(v8::Local<v8::Context>, uint32_t, v8::Local<v8::Value>)’
npm ERR!  3673 |   V8_WARN_UNUSED_RESULT Maybe<bool> Set(Local<Context> context, uint32_t index,
npm ERR!       |                                     ^~~
npm ERR! /home/victor/.cache/node-gyp/14.15.3/include/node/v8.h:3673:37: note:   candidate expects 3 arguments, 2 provided
npm ERR! In file included from ../src/addon.cpp:1:
npm ERR! ../src/addon.cpp: At global scope:
npm ERR! /home/victor/.cache/node-gyp/14.15.3/include/node/node.h:758:43: warning: cast between incompatible function types from ‘void (*)(Nan::ADDON_REGISTER_FUNCTION_ARGS_TYPE)’ {aka ‘void (*)(v8::Local<v8::Object>)’} to ‘node::addon_register_func’ {aka ‘void (*)(v8::Local<v8::Object>, v8::Local<v8::Value>, void*)’} [-Wcast-function-type]
npm ERR!   758 |       (node::addon_register_func) (regfunc),                          \
npm ERR!       |                                           ^
npm ERR! /home/victor/.cache/node-gyp/14.15.3/include/node/node.h:792:3: note: in expansion of macro ‘NODE_MODULE_X’
npm ERR!   792 |   NODE_MODULE_X(modname, regfunc, NULL, 0)  // NOLINT (readability/null_usage)
npm ERR!       |   ^~~~~~~~~~~~~
npm ERR! ../src/addon.cpp:164:1: note: in expansion of macro ‘NODE_MODULE’
npm ERR!   164 | NODE_MODULE(sha3, SHA3Hash::Init)
npm ERR!       | ^~~~~~~~~~~
npm ERR! make: *** [sha3.target.mk:115: Release/obj.target/sha3/src/addon.o] Error 1
npm ERR! gyp ERR! build error 
npm ERR! gyp ERR! stack Error: `make` failed with exit code: 2
npm ERR! gyp ERR! stack     at ChildProcess.onExit (/home/victor/.nvm/versions/node/v14.15.3/lib/node_modules/npm/node_modules/node-gyp/lib/build.js:194:23)
npm ERR! gyp ERR! stack     at ChildProcess.emit (events.js:315:20)
npm ERR! gyp ERR! stack     at Process.ChildProcess._handle.onexit (internal/child_process.js:277:12)
npm ERR! gyp ERR! System Linux 5.8.0-43-generic
npm ERR! gyp ERR! command "/home/victor/.nvm/versions/node/v14.15.3/bin/node" "/home/victor/.nvm/versions/node/v14.15.3/lib/node_modules/npm/node_modules/node-gyp/bin/node-gyp.js" "rebuild"
npm ERR! gyp ERR! cwd /home/victor/crypto/test/client/node_modules/sha3
npm ERR! gyp ERR! node -v v14.15.3
npm ERR! gyp ERR! node-gyp -v v7.1.2
npm ERR! gyp ERR! not ok

npm ERR! A complete log of this run can be found in:
npm ERR!     /home/victor/.npm/_logs/2021-02-22T00_07_50_582Z-debug.log
✔ Cleaning up temporary files
✖ Setting up box
Unbox failed!
✖ Setting up box
Unbox failed!
Error: Command failed: cd client && npm ci
npm ERR! code 1
npm ERR! path /home/victor/crypto/test/client/node_modules/sha3
npm ERR! command failed
npm ERR! command sh -c node-gyp rebuild
npm ERR! make: Entering directory '/home/victor/crypto/test/client/node_modules/sha3/build'
npm ERR!   CXX(target) Release/obj.target/sha3/src/addon.o
npm ERR! make: Leaving directory '/home/victor/crypto/test/client/node_modules/sha3/build'
npm ERR! gyp info it worked if it ends with ok
npm ERR! gyp info using node-gyp@7.1.2
npm ERR! gyp info using node@14.15.3 | linux | x64
npm ERR! gyp info find Python using Python version 3.8.5 found at "/home/victor/anaconda3/bin/python3"
npm ERR! gyp info spawn /home/victor/anaconda3/bin/python3
npm ERR! gyp info spawn args [
npm ERR! gyp info spawn args   '/home/victor/.nvm/versions/node/v14.15.3/lib/node_modules/npm/node_modules/node-gyp/gyp/gyp_main.py',
npm ERR! gyp info spawn args   'binding.gyp',

npm ERR! gyp info spawn args   '-I',

npm ERR! gyp info spawn args   '-I',

npm ERR! gyp info spawn args   '-Dlibrary=shared_library',
npm ERR! gyp info spawn args   '-Dvisibility=default',
npm ERR! gyp info spawn args   '-Dnode_root_dir=/home/victor/.cache/node-gyp/14.15.3',
npm ERR! gyp info spawn args   '-Dnode_gyp_dir=/home/victor/.nvm/versions/node/v14.15.3/lib/node_modules/npm/node_modules/node-gyp',
npm ERR! gyp info spawn args   '-Dnode_lib_file=/home/victor/.cache/node-gyp/14.15.3/<(target_arch)/node.lib',

npm ERR! gyp info spawn args   'build',
npm ERR! gyp info spawn args   '-Goutput_dir=.'
npm ERR! gyp info spawn args ]
npm ERR! gyp info spawn make
npm ERR! gyp info spawn args [ 'BUILDTYPE=Release', '-C', 'build' ]
npm ERR! In file included from ../src/addon.cpp:4:
npm ERR! ../node_modules/nan/nan.h: In function ‘void Nan::AsyncQueueWorker(Nan::AsyncWorker*)’:
npm ERR! ../node_modules/nan/nan.h:2232:62: warning: cast between incompatible function types from ‘void (*)(uv_work_t*)’ {aka ‘void (*)(uv_work_s*)’} to ‘uv_after_work_cb’ {aka ‘void (*)(uv_work_s*, int)’} [-Wcast-function-type]
npm ERR!  2232 |     , reinterpret_cast<uv_after_work_cb>(AsyncExecuteComplete)
npm ERR!       |                                                              ^
npm ERR! ../src/addon.cpp: In static member function ‘static Nan::NAN_METHOD_RETURN_TYPE SHA3Hash::New(Nan::NAN_METHOD_ARGS_TYPE)’:

npm ERR!    49 |    obj = new SHA3Hash();
npm ERR!       |                       ^

npm ERR! ../src/addon.cpp:49:23: note: use ‘-faligned-new’ to enable C++17 over-aligned new support
npm ERR! ../src/addon.cpp: In static member function ‘static void SHA3Hash::Init(Nan::ADDON_REGISTER_FUNCTION_ARGS_TYPE)’:
npm ERR! ../src/addon.cpp:83:27: error: no matching function for call to ‘v8::Object::Set(v8::Local<v8::String>&, v8::Local<v8::Function>&)’
npm ERR!    83 |   target->Set(className, f);
npm ERR!       |                           ^
npm ERR! In file included from /home/victor/.cache/node-gyp/14.15.3/include/node/node.h:67,
npm ERR!                  from ../src/addon.cpp:1:
npm ERR! /home/victor/.cache/node-gyp/14.15.3/include/node/v8.h:3670:37: note: candidate: ‘v8::Maybe<bool> v8::Object::Set(v8::Local<v8::Context>, v8::Local<v8::Value>, v8::Local<v8::Value>)’
npm ERR!  3670 |   V8_WARN_UNUSED_RESULT Maybe<bool> Set(Local<Context> context,
npm ERR!       |                                     ^~~
npm ERR! /home/victor/.cache/node-gyp/14.15.3/include/node/v8.h:3670:37: note:   candidate expects 3 arguments, 2 provided
npm ERR! /home/victor/.cache/node-gyp/14.15.3/include/node/v8.h:3673:37: note: candidate: ‘v8::Maybe<bool> v8::Object::Set(v8::Local<v8::Context>, uint32_t, v8::Local<v8::Value>)’
npm ERR!  3673 |   V8_WARN_UNUSED_RESULT Maybe<bool> Set(Local<Context> context, uint32_t index,
npm ERR!       |                                     ^~~
npm ERR! /home/victor/.cache/node-gyp/14.15.3/include/node/v8.h:3673:37: note:   candidate expects 3 arguments, 2 provided
npm ERR! In file included from ../src/addon.cpp:1:
npm ERR! ../src/addon.cpp: At global scope:
npm ERR! /home/victor/.cache/node-gyp/14.15.3/include/node/node.h:758:43: warning: cast between incompatible function types from ‘void (*)(Nan::ADDON_REGISTER_FUNCTION_ARGS_TYPE)’ {aka ‘void (*)(v8::Local<v8::Object>)’} to ‘node::addon_register_func’ {aka ‘void (*)(v8::Local<v8::Object>, v8::Local<v8::Value>, void*)’} [-Wcast-function-type]
npm ERR!   758 |       (node::addon_register_func) (regfunc),                          \
npm ERR!       |                                           ^

npm ERR!   792 |   NODE_MODULE_X(modname, regfunc, NULL, 0)  // NOLINT (readability/null_usage)

npm ERR!       | ^~~~~~~~~~~

npm ERR! gyp ERR! build error 
npm ERR! gyp ERR! stack Error: `make` failed with exit code: 2
npm ERR! gyp ERR! stack     at ChildProcess.onExit (/home/victor/.nvm/versions/node/v14.15.3/lib/node_modules/npm/node_modules/node-gyp/lib/build.js:194:23)
npm ERR! gyp ERR! stack     at ChildProcess.emit (events.js:315:20)
npm ERR! gyp ERR! stack     at Process.ChildProcess._handle.onexit (internal/child_process.js:277:12)

npm ERR! gyp ERR! node -v v14.15.3
npm ERR! gyp ERR! node-gyp -v v7.1.2
npm ERR! gyp ERR! not ok

npm ERR! A complete log of this run can be found in:
npm ERR!     /home/victor/.npm/_logs/2021-02-22T00_07_50_582Z-debug.log

    at checkExecSyncError (child_process.js:616:11)
    at Object.execSync (child_process.js:652:15)
    at Object.installBoxDependencies (/home/victor/.nvm/versions/node/v14.15.3/lib/node_modules/truffle/build/webpack:/packages/box/dist/lib/utils/unbox.js:138:1)
    at Object.setUpBox (/home/victor/.nvm/versions/node/v14.15.3/lib/node_modules/truffle/build/webpack:/packages/box/dist/lib/utils/index.js:66:1)
    at /home/victor/.nvm/versions/node/v14.15.3/lib/node_modules/truffle/build/webpack:/packages/box/dist/box.js:117:1
    at Generator.next (<anonymous>)
    at fulfilled (/home/victor/.nvm/versions/node/v14.15.3/lib/node_modules/truffle/build/webpack:/packages/box/dist/box.js:5:42)
## Environment

* Operating System: Ubuntu 20.04.1 LTS
* Ethereum client: n/a
* Truffle version (`v5.1.63`):
* node version (`v14.15.3`):
* npm version (`v7.5.3`):
Thanks @victor-wei126 for opening the issue and providing the stack trace!

I have this exact issue also.
Mac OS 10.15.7
Truffle `v5.1.8` (core: 5.1.8)
Solidity `v0.5.12` (solc-js)
Node `v15.7.0`
Web3.js `v1.2.1`
npm `7.6.0`

I notice that after running either `truffle unbox react` or `npx truffle unbox react` the client directory contains no `node_modules` directory.

[edited Apr 5 to add]
python `v3.7.9`

Same issue:
Mac OS `11.1`
Truffle `v5.3.0`
node `v15.13.0`
npm `7.7.6`


Looks like I'm able to reproduce this error on Node 15. It was successful on Node 12 and 14 on mac for me.
upgraded node to 14.16.1 and it worked!

Was running This
npm 7.5.1
Truffle v5.3.2 (core: 5.3.2)
Solidity v0.5.16 (solc-js)
Node v15.8.0
Web3.js v1.3.5

Downgraded Node to 14.16.1
and npm to 6.14.12 and it worked...

> Was running This
> npm 7.5.1
> Truffle v5.3.2 (core: 5.3.2)
> Solidity v0.5.16 (solc-js)
> Node v15.8.0
> Web3.js v1.3.5
> 
> Downgraded Node to 14.16.1
> and npm to 6.14.12 and it worked...

Thank you!Solved my problem

> 14.16.1
I still failed with this version.
gyp ERR! node -v v14.16.1
gyp ERR! node-gyp -v v3.6.2
gyp ERR! not ok 
Build failed with error code: 1
npm ERR! code ELIFECYCLE
npm ERR! errno 1
npm ERR! node-sass@4.5.3 postinstall: `node scripts/build.js`
npm ERR! Exit status 1
npm ERR! 
npm ERR! Failed at the node-sass@4.5.3 postinstall script.
npm ERR! This is probably not a problem with npm. There is likely additional logging output above.

Hi I am having the same issue and downgrading did not help.

Ubuntu 20.04
npm 7.12.0
Truffle v5.3.5 (core: 5.3.5)
Node v16.1.0
git version 2.25.1

`Starting unbox...
=================

npm ERR! (Use `node --trace-deprecation ...` to show where the warning was created)

npm ERR! gyp info spawn args   '/usr/lib/node_modules/npm/node_modules/node-gyp/gyp/gyp_main.py',
npm ERR! gyp info spawn args   'binding.gyp',
npm ERR! gyp info spawn args   '-f',
npm ERR! gyp info spawn args   'make',

For everyone using npm version 7.x.x: try downgrading to npm version 6.x.x and unboxing. npm 7 has been causing some issues with Truffle. Let me know if this resolves your problem.

> For everyone using npm version 7.x.x: try downgrading to npm version 6.x.x and unboxing. npm 7 has been causing some issues with Truffle. Let me know if this resolves your problem.

thanks @eggplantzzz . it worked for me. I had been struggling for more than a week. 
```
>npm -v
6.14.13
>truffle version
Truffle v5.3.5 (core: 5.3.5)
Solidity v0.5.16 (solc-js)
Node v16.1.0
Web3.js v1.3.5
```

it's something with npm version 7.x.x
Homebrew allow you to install multiple node versions.
So install node 14 with brew
`brew install node@14`
export the path
`export PATH=/usr/local/Cellar/node@14/14.17.0/bin:$PATH`
and run the truffle
`truffle unbox react `
Ok, eventually we'll have to tackle using npm v7 but in the meantime I'm glad there is a workaround!
